mapper.sql: T.TRANSFER_ID, T.AVM_TRX_ID, T.COMPANY_ID, T.BRANCH_ID, T.REQUEST_NO, T.BAST_DOC_NO, T.REQUEST_DATE, T.BRANCH_ORIGIN, T.BRANCH_DESTINATION, T.REASON, T.STATUS_ID, T.STATUS_CODE, T.CREATED_BY, T.CREATION_DATE, T.LAST_UPDATE_BY, T.LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID, (case when T.BRANCH_ORIGIN = -1 then 'Head Office' else (SELECT ORGANIZATION_NAME from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = T.BRANCH_ORIGIN and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_NAME_ORIGIN, (case when T.BRANCH_DESTINATION = -1 then 'Head Office' else (SELECT ORGANIZATION_NAME from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = T.BRANCH_DESTINATION and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_NAME_DESTINATION, T.BRANCH_DESTINATION, BLD.DESCRIPTION,
from SOC_TRANSFER_HDR T INNER JOIN BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS BLD on BLD.DETAIL_CODE = T.STATUS_CODE LEFT JOIN SAM_USERS U ON U.USER_ID = T.LAST_UPDATE_BY
order by ${orderByClause}

select DISTINCT 'false' as QUERYID, (case when T.BRANCH_ORIGIN = -1 then 'HEADOFFICE' else (SELECT SUBSTR (ORGANIZATION_CODE, -5) as branch_code from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = T.BRANCH_ORIGIN and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_CODE_ORIGIN, (case when T.BRANCH_ORIGIN = -1 then 'Head Office' else (SELECT ORGANIZATION_NAME from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = T.BRANCH_ORIGIN and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_NAME_ORIGIN, (case when T.BRANCH_DESTINATION = -1 then 'HEADOFFICE' else (SELECT SUBSTR (ORGANIZATION_CODE, -5) as branch_code from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = T.BRANCH_DESTINATION and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_CODE_DESTINATION, (case when T.BRANCH_DESTINATION = -1 then 'Head Office' else (SELECT ORGANIZATION_NAME from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = T.BRANCH_DESTINATION and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_NAME_DESTINATION,
from SOC_TRANSFER_HDR T where T.TRANSFER_ID = #{transferId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.update: update SOC_TRANSFER_HDR SET BAST_DOC_NO = #{bastDocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_ID = #{statusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CODE= #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TRANSFER_ID = #{transferId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SOC_TRANSFER_HDR SET STATUS_ID = #{statusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CODE= #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TRANSFER_ID = #{transferId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
select SOC_TRANSFER_HDR_S.nextVal from dual
insert into SOC_TRANSFER_HDR ( TRANSFER_ID, AVM_TRX_ID, COMPANY_ID, BRANCH_ID, REQUEST_NO, BAST_DOC_NO, REQUEST_DATE, BRANCH_ORIGIN, BRANCH_DESTINATION, REASON, EBS_FLAG, STATUS_ID, STATUS_CODE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{transferId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{avmTrxIdString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{branchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{requestNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bastDocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{branchOrigin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{branchDestination,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebsFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT LOOKUP_ID FROM BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS WHERE DETAIL_CODE = #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum=1), #{statusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into SOC_TRANSFER_HDR
TRANSFER_ID,
REQUEST_DATE,
CREATED_BY,
CREATION_DATE,
LAST_UPDATE_BY,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
#{requestDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from SOC_TRANSFER_HDR
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.sql: ASSET_ID, EBS_ASSET_ID, ASSET_NUMBER, TAG_NUMBER, SERIAL_NUMBER, DESCRIPTION, CATEGORY_ID, COMPANY_ID, BRANCH_ID, LOCATION_ID, POSITION, DATE_PLACED_IN_SERVICE, LIFE_IN_MONTHS, ORIGINAL_COST, UNREVALUED_COST, BOOK_TYPE_CODE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT bld.LOOKUP_ID KEY, bld.DETAIL_CODE VALUE, bld.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION FROM BSE_LOOKUP_DEPENDENTS bld WHERE rownum=1 AND UPPER(bld.DETAIL_CODE) = #{key} ORDER BY bld.DESCRIPTION ASC

select 'false' as QUERYID,
FROM SOC_TRANSFER_HDR T LEFT JOIN SAM_USERS U ON U.USER_ID = T.LAST_UPDATE_BY where AVM_TRX_ID = #{avmTrxIdString, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ROWNUM = 1
select request_no from(select request_no from SOC_TRANSFER_HDR order by transfer_id desc) where rownum =1
select bast_doc_no from(select bast_doc_no from SOC_TRANSFER_HDR where bast_doc_no is not null order by transfer_id desc) where rownum =1
SELECT DISTINCT fal.location_id FROM FA_LOCATIONS@FIFGL.FIF.CO.ID fal INNER JOIN wos_locations wl ON WL.LOCATION_CODE = fal.segment1 WHERE wl.location_id = #{locationId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT SUBSTR(branch_code, 0, 3) AS BRANCH_CODE_ORIGIN FROM wos_organization_versions WHERE organization_id = #{branchId, jdbcType=DECIMAL} and TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN date_from AND date_to
mapper.insert:
select GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS_S.nextVal@FIFGL.FIF.CO.ID from dual
INSERT INTO GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS@FIFGL.FIF.CO.ID ( code_combination_id, last_update_date, last_updated_by, chart_of_accounts_id, detail_posting_allowed_flag, detail_budgeting_allowed_flag, account_type, enabled_flag, summary_flag, segment1, segment2, segment3, segment4, segment5, segment6, segment7, segment8) VALUES (#{codeCombinationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sysdate, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, '50268', 'Y', 'Y', 'E', 'Y', 'N', #{segment1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{segment2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{segment3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{segment4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{segment5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{segment6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{segment7, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{segment8, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT gl.code_combination_id, gl.segment4 FROM fa_additions_b@fifgl.fif.co.ID ab LEFT JOIN fa_additions_tl@fifgl.fif.co.ID AT ON AT.asset_id = ab.asset_id LEFT JOIN fa_categories_b@fifgl.fif.co.ID cat ON cat.category_id = ab.asset_category_id LEFT JOIN fa_distribution_history@fifgl.fif.co.ID hist ON hist.asset_id = ab.asset_id AND hist.date_ineffective IS NULL LEFT JOIN gl_code_combinations@fifgl.fif.co.ID gl ON gl.code_combination_id = hist.code_combination_id LEFT JOIN fa_locations@fifgl.fif.co.ID loc ON loc.location_id = hist.location_id LEFT JOIN fa_books@fifgl.fif.co.ID bk ON bk.asset_id = ab.asset_id AND bk.date_ineffective IS NULL AND bk.book_type_code LIKE 'COMMERCIAL%' LEFT JOIN fa_category_book_defaults@fifgl.fif.co.ID bkd ON bkd.category_id = cat.category_id AND bkd.book_type_code = bk.book_type_code LEFT JOIN fa_retirements@fifgl.fif.co.ID ret ON ret.asset_id = ab.asset_id AND ret.transaction_header_id_in = bk.transaction_header_id_in AND status = 'PROCESSED' AND ret.book_type_code = bk.book_type_code LEFT JOIN bse_companies comp ON comp.company_name = SUBSTR (bk.book_type_code, -3) LEFT JOIN wos_locations wosloc ON wosloc.location_code = loc.segment1 AND wosloc.company_id = comp.company_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT wl.location_id LOCATION_ID, wl.location_code LOCATION_CODE, wl.location_name LOCATION_NAME, branch_owner_id BRANCH_ID, company_id COMPANY_ID FROM wos_locations wl INNER JOIN wos_location_versions wlv ON wlv.location_id = wl.location_id)) temp ON wosloc.location_id = temp.location_id AND temp.company_id = comp.company_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT wo.organization_id BRANCH_ID, wo.organization_code BRANCH_CODE, wo.organization_name BRANCH_NAME FROM wos_location_versions wlv JOIN wos_locations wl ON wl.location_id = wlv.location_id JOIN wos_organizations wo ON wo.organization_id = wlv.branch_owner_id WHERE TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN wlv.date_from AND wlv.date_to UNION SELECT -1 organization_id, 'HEADOFFICE' organization_code, 'Head Office' organization_name FROM DUAL) branch ON branch.BRANCH_ID = temp.branch_id
WHERE bk.book_type_code LIKE 'COMMERCIAL%' AND ab.asset_id = #{ebsAssetId, jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND ROWNUM = 1
